entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Vernon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:16 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vernon 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -8.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -12.8°C
Wind: E 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm near Enderby and Lumby. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm except 20 cm near Enderby and Lumby. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
